ADC.title: Analog to Digital Convertor
ADC.body: ADC device converts input voltage to digital word.

FPGA.title: Field Programmable Gate Array
FPGA.body: A large programmable logic device. The FPGA program image on D-TACQ products is loaded from flash memory at boot time, allowing for easy in-system upgrade.

CPCI.title: Compact PCI
CPCI.body: Industrial implementation of the PCI bus, based on standard Eurocard modules.

SAR.title: Successive Approximation Register
SAR.body: ADC control alogorithm ramps digital value stepwise until analog match is obtained

EPICS.title: Experimental Physics and Industrial Control System
EPICS.body: A set of software tools, libraries and applications developed collaboratively and used worldwide to create distributed soft real-time control systems for scientific instruments such as a particle accelerators, telescopes and other large scientific experiments.

MDSplus.title: MDSplus
MDSplus.body: A set of software tools for data acquisition and storage and a methodology for management of complex scientific data.

CSS/BOY.title: Control System Studio
CSS/BOY.body: Multiplatform Operator Interface (OPI) used with EPICS process control system. Example OPI provided by D-TACQ may be easily extended by the user. Cross-platform runtime available free of charge

dropbear.title: Dropbear
dropbear.body: Dropbear is a relatively small SSH 2 server and client. It runs on a variety of POSIX-based platforms. Dropbear is open source software, distributed under a MIT-style license. Dropbear is particularly useful for embedded-type Linux (or other Unix) systems

PXI.title: PCI eXtensions for Instrumentation
PXI.body: Additional signaling on top of the Compact PCI standard.

SBC.title: Single Board Computer
SBC.body: Self contained computer system in single slot standard formfactor
